title: Part 521 - Fraud, Waste and Abuse Prevention
content:
Part 521 - Fraud, Waste and Abuse Prevention

State Regulations

Subpart 521-1 - COMPLIANCE PROGRAMS (ยง 521-1.1 to 521-1.5)

Subpart 521-2 - MEDICAID MANAGED CARE FRAUD, WASTE AND ABUSE PREVENTION (ยง 521-2.1 to 521-2.4)

Subpart 521-3 - SELF-DISCLOSURE PROGRAM (ยง 521-3.1 to 521-3.7)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
